name: Aqua Carpatica Spring Water Glass Bottle
source: Carpathian Mountains of Romania, from the Bajenaru Spring.
description: Aqua Carpatica Still Water is a premium mineral water sourced from the Carpathian Mountains, rich in essential minerals that promote hydration and support overall health. It is naturally low in sodium and free from contaminants, but excessive consumption may lead to mineral imbalance.

ingredients.name: Sulfate
ingredients.desc: Sulfates refer to a group of salts or esters of sulfuric acid commonly used in personal care products and some food additives. In food, sulfates may be present as preservatives or processing agents...
ingredients.risks: Allergic reactions in sulfite-sensitive individuals, potential gastrointestinal irritation in some, skin irritation in topical applications
ingredients.benefits: Preservative properties, antimicrobial effects in food processing, cleaning efficacy in personal care products

ingredients.name: Barium
ingredients.desc: A heavy metal element not used as a food ingredient. Toxic to humans if ingested or inhaled in soluble forms. Exposure can cause muscle weakness, respiratory issues, and cardiovascular effects. No ...
ingredients.risks: Toxicity, muscle weakness, respiratory distress, cardiac arrhythmias, potential fatal poisoning
ingredients.benefits: None

ingredients.name: Calcium
ingredients.desc: Essential mineral vital for bone health, muscle function, nerve transmission, and vascular contraction. Recognized by the FDA as generally safe and necessary nutrient when consumed in recommended a...
ingredients.risks: Kidney stones in excessive intake, hypercalcemia with overdose, potential interaction with certain medications
ingredients.benefits: Supports bone density, prevents osteoporosis, aids muscle contraction, essential for nerve signaling, assists blood clotting

ingredients.name: Magnesium
ingredients.desc: Essential dietary mineral involved in over 300 enzymatic reactions, including energy production, muscle and nerve function, and bone health. Recognized as safe and necessary by the FDA.
ingredients.risks: Diarrhea and gastrointestinal upset at excessive supplemental doses, risk of toxicity primarily in individuals with kidney impairment
ingredients.benefits: Supports energy metabolism, muscle relaxation, nerve function, bone strength, cardiovascular health

ingredients.risks: Hyperkalemia at excessive intake, which can cause heart arrhythmias, muscle weakness
ingredients.benefits: Supports cardiovascular health, helps regulate blood pressure, essential for nerve and muscle function

ingredients.name: Sodium
ingredients.desc: An essential mineral and electrolyte critical for maintaining fluid balance, nerve function, and muscle contraction. Sodium is naturally present in many foods and commonly consumed as sodium chlori...
ingredients.risks: Hypertension, cardiovascular disease risk with excessive intake
ingredients.benefits: Essential electrolyte, supports nerve transmission, muscle function, fluid balance

ingredients.name: Nickel
ingredients.desc: Nickel is a metal commonly used in various industrial applications including alloys, plating, and electronics. Exposure to nickel occurs mainly through skin contact and inhalation in occupational s...
ingredients.risks: Allergic contact dermatitis, respiratory sensitization, carcinogenic potential with chronic inhalation exposure
ingredients.benefits: None

ingredients.name: Gross Alpha
ingredients.desc: Measures the total alpha radiation emitted by all alpha-emitting radionuclides in a water sample, such as uranium and thorium, to assess overall alpha radiation levels.
ingredients.risks: Internal tissue damage and increased cancer risk due to their ionizing nature when ingested or inhaled.
ingredients.benefits: None

ingredients.name: Gross Beta
ingredients.desc: Measures the total beta radiation emitted by all beta-emitting radionuclides in a water sample, such as strontium-90 and cesium-137, to evaluate overall beta radiation levels.
ingredients.risks: Internal tissue damage, increased cancer risk, and potential harm to the thyroid.
ingredients.benefits: None.

name: Blue Spring Living Water Glass Bottle
source: Natural spring water from a little town in Blount County Blountsville Alabama.
treatment: The first step in the bottling process is the water’s exit through the rock aquifer, which naturally purifies the water. To further assure the highest health standard for water to be consumed by humans, we pump the water into a holding tank and then through two separate .5 micron filters. The water then enters an ozone tank for a natural sterilization process, which naturally cleans and disinfects anything that may be in the bottle or cap.
description: Mineral-enriched guaranteed fresh, pure, delicious, healing water.

ingredients.benefits: None.

ingredients.benefits: Prevents dental caries, strengthens tooth enamel, reduces tooth decay

ingredients.name: Gross Alpha
ingredients.desc: Measures the total alpha radiation emitted by all alpha-emitting radionuclides in a water sample, such as uranium and thorium, to assess overall alpha radiation levels.
ingredients.risks: Internal tissue damage and increased cancer risk due to their ionizing nature when ingested or inhaled.
ingredients.benefits: None

ingredients.name: Gross Beta
ingredients.desc: Measures the total beta radiation emitted by all beta-emitting radionuclides in a water sample, such as strontium-90 and cesium-137, to evaluate overall beta radiation levels.
ingredients.risks: Internal tissue damage, increased cancer risk, and potential harm to the thyroid.
ingredients.benefits: None.

source: Natural mineral-water fountain, which is the Vellamo fountain in the little village of Viikinäinen. The sources of bottled water include rivers, lakes, streams, ponds, reservoirs, springs, and wells. As water naturally travels over the surface of the land or through the ground, it can pick up naturally occurring substances as well as substances that are present due to animal and human activity.
treatment:
uv, activated carbon filtration, 0.2 micron absolute, iron/manganese filter, uranium filter,
carbonation
description: A natural herbal tea blend known for its calming effects. It promotes relaxation and improved sleep but may cause allergic reactions in sensitive individuals or interact with certain medications.
filtration: Ultraviolet (UV) Treatment, Carbon Filtration, Micron Filtration
